TopicTitle: Flight report sometimes shows bizarre G-force stats after recovery

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Wine 9.0-rc3 on Linux | CPU: AMD Ryzen 7 | GPU: NVIDIA 3060 Ti | RAM: 32GB

 

In some circumstances, the flight report displayed after recovering a landed vehicle shows what seem to be unrealistic G-force statistics for the flight, such as "highest G: 137.6g" for a simple flight around Kerbin and back down. I haven't found a consistent reproducer for this, but I have noticed that the G meter next to the crew display sometimes jumps to off-scale high for a single frame while orbiting a celestial body, which is clearly wrong (nothing colliding with the vehicle, naturally).

Severity: Low
